review: Very good game .  The crafting system is somewhat limited and its hard to amass items to build your own ammo, which is usually cheaper to just buy.  The storyline is good , the lore is imersive , and the gameplay is fun.  I can reccomend this to anyone whos like rpgs or survival games.  The only other (minor) thing that could be annoying to some people is the npc's stand completely still when talking and never break eye contact.
